subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: For Patrick Chan, 23, the reigning figure skating world champion, the biggest challenge may be overcoming doubts. A former Olympian said the decisive question in the men’s individual competition is, “Who will wilt?”
snippet: For Patrick Chan, 23, the reigning figure skating world champion, the biggest challenge may be overcoming doubts. A former Olympian said the decisive question in the men’s individual competition is, “Who will wilt?”
